name: Poseidon Network
description: Poseidon Network provides decentralized edge solutions aimed at creating a worldwide P2P infrastructure. This includes decentralized CDN, storage, and computing. Users can provide their unused bandwidth and storage from their devices, such as NAS, computers, and mobile devices. Poseidon's platform network collects and re-allocates these resources to users who need them. It utilizes idle resources and allows users to share those resources in exchange for rewards.
